isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - PISTON AND/OR SLEEVE, REPLACE (I-6 MECH.)

step1.para: Open/close door and hood, and chock wheels.
Disconnect battery cable.
Drain cooling system.
Remove right front wheel assy; include support front axle.
Remove surge tank and mount bracket.
Remove complete air filter assembly.
Remove upper radiator support strut rods.
Remove upper radiator hose.
Remove both charge air pipes.
Remove fan/clutch assembly; use tool.
Remove fan shroud.
Remove serpentine belt.
Remove fan belt pulley.
Disconnect alternator wires, remove alternator and alternator wire harness and hose support bracket.
Remove belt tensioner.
Remove alternator support bracket.
Remove wire harness from valve cover area; include sensor and sending unit wires.
Remove all fuel injector lines.
Remove fuel return lines from injectors; include aneroid line.
Remove all fuel injectors; use tool.
Remove crankcase breather tube.
Remove valve cover and gasket.
Disconnect exhaust pipe at turbo; include remove turbo oil lines.
Remove rocker arm and push rods.
Remove cylinder head bolts.
Install lifting device to cylinder head.
Remove cylinder head (2 people).
Drain engine oil.
Remove oil pan.
Clean carbon from cylinder bore.
Remove connecting rod cap and bearings, remove piston assembly from cylinder.

item.para: Using special tool, remove sleeve and seals.

step1.para: Clean cylinder head, block and oil pan surfaces.
Install piston assembly into cylinder bore; use ring compressor to compress piston rings.
Install connecting rod bearing, install rod bearing cap, and torque cap bolts to spec.
Install new head gasket using lifting device and place cylinder head in position.
Install cylinder head bolt loose.
Install push rods and rocker arm shaft.
Tighten head bolts to spec.
Adjust valve lash clearance.
Install valve cover gasket and valve cover, and torque bolts to spec.
Install crankcase breather tube.
Install all fuel injectors and torque hold down bolts to spec.
Install fuel return lines; include aneroid line.
Install all fuel injector lines and torque nuts to spec.
Install turbo oil lines and exhaust pipe to turbo.
Install fan hub pulley and torque bolt to spec.
Install alternator support bracket and torque bolts to spec.
Install belt tensioner, torque bolt to spec.
Install fan shroud.
Install fan/clutch assembly; use special tool.
Install serpentine belt.
Install alternator.
Install alternator wiring, wire/hose and support bracket to alternator.
Install wire harness assembly to valve cover; include sensors and sending unit connections.
Connect both charge air pipes.
Install upper radiator hose.
Install upper rad. support strut rods.
Install complete air filter assembly.
Install surge tank mount bracket and tank.
Install front wheel assy., torque lug nuts to spec, and lower vehicle.
Install oil pan gasket and oil pan, and torque pan bolts to spec.
Fill engine oil to spec.
Fill cooling system.
Connect battery.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
